explanation: [0-0] In a room with light beige cabinets and white countertops sits a black-haired girl wearing a blue and white striped top and glasses. There are some bouquets on the counter. The girl looks down at a slice of watermelon on the table in front of her. There is a subtitle "Kids Line" in the upper right corner.
[0-6] The girl happily picks up the watermelon on the table and prepares to eat it, suddenly her smile disappears and she looks to the right, then sighs helplessly and gets up and walks to the right.
